js: (function() { var habits = [{ name: 'Lecture', done: [false, false, false, false, false, false, false] }, { name: 'Méditation', done: [false, false, false, false, false, false, false] }]; var container = api.root.querySelector('#habit-list'); async function init() { var saved = await api.getState(); if (saved) { habits = saved; } render(); } function render() { container.innerHTML = ''; habits.forEach(function(habit, hIdx) { var row = document.createElement('div'); row.className = 'habit-row'; var input = document.createElement('input'); input.className = 'habit-name'; input.value = habit.name; input.setAttribute('data-idx', hIdx); input.addEventListener('change', async function(e) { var idx = parseInt(e.target.getAttribute('data-idx')); habits[idx].name = e.target.value; await api.saveState(habits); }); var dots = document.createElement('div'); dots.className = 'dots-container'; habit.done.forEach(function(status, dIdx) { var dot = document.createElement('div'); dot.className = 'dot' + (status ? ' active' : ''); dot.setAttribute('data-h', hIdx); dot.setAttribute('data-d', dIdx); dot.addEventListener('click', async function() { var h = parseInt(this.getAttribute('data-h')); var d = parseInt(this.getAttribute('data-d')); habits[h].done[d] = !habits[h].done[d]; await api.saveState(habits); render(); }); dots.appendChild(dot); }); var btnDel = document.createElement('button'); btnDel.className = 'btn-delete'; btnDel.innerHTML = '×'; btnDel.onclick = async function() { habits.splice(hIdx, 1); await api.saveState(habits); render(); }; row.appendChild(input); row.appendChild(dots); row.appendChild(btnDel); container.appendChild(row); }); } async function addHabitHandler() { habits.push({ name: 'Nouvelle habitude', done: [false, false, false, false, false, false, false] }); render(); await api.saveState(habits); } var btnAdd = api.root.querySelector('#btn-add-habit'); if (btnAdd) btnAdd.addEventListener('click', addHabitHandler); init(); })();
